title: Devlog
subtitle: Documenting the journey of your development.

steps.title: 1. Log Your Journey
steps.description: Document your daily coding progress, challenges faced, and solutions found to keep track of your growth.

steps.title: 2. Share Insights
steps.description: Publish your technical learnings, snippets, and tutorials to help others in the developer community.

steps.title: 3. Build Portfolio
steps.description: Showcase your consistency, growth, and completed projects to potential employers and collaborators.
